info.description: Apache Flume is a distributed, reliable, and available service for efficiently collecting, aggregating, and moving large amounts of log data.
info.title: Apache Flume

info.author: regular.express

properties.help: Flume serializers config string for regex extractor.
properties.name: flume_context
properties.example:
regex = (\d):(\d):(\d)
serializers = s1 s2 s3
serializers.s1.name = one
serializers.s2.name = two
serializers.s3.name = three

properties.help: Regular expression for matching excluded events. (default is ".*")
properties.name: regex

properties.help: If true, a regex match determines events to exclude, otherwise a regex determines events to include.
properties.name: excludeEvents
